ValidationRule.description: As per INC0000541962 new restrictions added for profile on Case edit
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile && AND(OR(ISCHANGED(OwnerId),ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId),ISCHANGED(HasSelfServiceComments),ISCHANGED(HasCommentsUnreadByOwner),ISCHANGED(Status)), OR(($Profile.Name =='C&PS D&S (Non US)'),($Profile.Name =='C&PS D&S (US)'),($Profile.Name =='CSO (Non US)'),($Profile.Name =='CSM (Non US)'),($Profile.Name =='CSM (US)')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Your profile don't have access to change the Case Ownership, Record Type, Status or Comments.
